channel.title: Projects on Wenyao Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Wenyao Liu

item.title: Similarity Checking on four speed measurment systems
item.description: **Note: The project is undergoing and some details cannot be provided.** Introduction To improve decision making, it is vital to monotor the speed on pavement network. Four speed measurment systems are available in Oklahoma and their compabilty is unknown. Featured results 1. Viualize the site/segment in different systems Fig. 1 Speed measurement location comparisons. 2. Compare the similarity between 4 systems site by site Fig. 2 Similarity factors between 4 systems site by site (-1 to 1, with 1 as the best).

item.title: Peridynamics-based simulation of asphalt mixture cracking in semi-circular bending (SCB) test
item.description:
Highlights

  1. Peridynamics model was applied to simulate SCB testing for asphalt mixtures.
  2. Cracking patterns in simulation match lab observations well.
  3. Fracture energy and P-u curve from simulation agrees with experimental results.
  4. Arch effect and energy transformation during SCB testing were investigated.

item.title: Peridynamics-based simulation of asphalt mixture cracking in semi-circular bending (SCB) test
item.description: In this project, peridynamics, a new fracture mechanics methodology that extends classical continuum mechanics to discontinuous material responses, is implemented to simulate crack propagation during the SCB testing process.
